verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>

"The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall encamp<WH2583> every man<WH376> by his own standard,<WH1714> with the banners<WH226> of their fathers<WH1>' houses:<WH1004> at a distance<WH5048> from the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> shall they encamp<WH2583> around it.<WH5439>"

Those who encamp<WH2583> on the east side<WH6924> toward the sunrise<WH4217> shall be of the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Judah,<WH3063> according to their divisions:<WH6635> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> shall be Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab.<WH5992>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH7657> were seventy-four thousand<WH505> six<WH8337> hundred.<WH3967>

Those who encamp<WH2583> next to him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar:<WH3485> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Issachar<WH3485> shall be Nethanel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar.<WH6686>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of it,<WH2572> were fifty - four<WH702> thousand<WH505> four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>
The tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun:<WH2074> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074> shall be Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon.<WH2497>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of it,<WH2572> were fifty - seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

All who were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Judah<WH3063> were one hundred<WH3967> eighty<WH8084> - six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> four<WH702> hundred,<WH3967> according to their divisions.<WH6635> They shall set out<WH5265> first.<WH7223>

"On the south side<WH8486> shall be the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Reuben<WH7205> according to their divisions.<WH6635> The prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> shall be Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur.<WH7707>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of it,<WH705> were forty - six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>

"Those who encamp<WH2583> next to him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Simeon.<WH8095> The prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> shall be Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai.<WH6701>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH2572> were fifty - nine<WH8672> thousand<WH505> three<WH7969> hundred.<WH3967>
"The tribe<WH4294> of Gad:<WH1410> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> shall be Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Reuel.<WH7467>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH705> were forty - five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> fifty.<WH2572>

"All who were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Reuben<WH7205> were one<WH259> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> - one<WH259> thousand<WH505> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> fifty,<WH2572> according to their armies.<WH6635> They shall set out<WH5265> second.<WH8145>

"Then the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> shall set out,<WH5265> with the camp<WH4264> of the Levites<WH3881> in the midst<WH8432> of the camps.<WH4264> As they encamp,<WH2583> so shall they set out,<WH5265> every man<WH376> in his place,<WH3027> by their standards.<WH1714>

"On the west side<WH3220> shall be the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their divisions:<WH6635> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> shall be Elishama<WH476> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud.<WH5989>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH705> were forty thousand<WH505> five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>
"Next to him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh:<WH4519> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> shall be Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur.<WH6301>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH7970> were thirty - two thousand<WH505> two<WH8147> hundred.<WH3967>
"The tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin:<WH1144> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> shall be Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni.<WH1441>
His army,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH7970> were thirty - five<WH2568> thirty-five<WH505> thousand four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

"All who were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Ephraim<WH669> were one hundred<WH3967> eight<WH8083> thousand<WH505> one hundred,<WH3967> according to their divisions.<WH6635> They shall set<WH5265> out third.<WH7992>

"On the north side<WH6828> shall be the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Dan<WH1835> according to their divisions:<WH6635> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> shall be Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai.<WH5996>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH8346> were sixty - two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> seven<WH7651> hundred.<WH3967>

"Those who encamp<WH2583> next to him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Asher:<WH836> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Asher<WH836> shall be Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ochran.<WH5918>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH705> were forty - one<WH259> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>
"The tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali:<WH5321> and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321> shall be Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan.<WH5881>
His division,<WH6635> and those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH2572> were fifty - three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

"All who were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Dan<WH1835> were one hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> - seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> six<WH8337> hundred.<WH3967> They shall set<WH5265> out last<WH314> by their standards.<WH1714>"

These are those who were numbered<WH6485> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> by their fathers<WH1>' houses.<WH1004> All who were numbered<WH6485> of the camps<WH4264> according to their armies<WH6635> were six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> fifty.<WH2572>
But the Levites<WH3881> were not numbered<WH6485> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

Thus the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did.<WH6213> According to all that Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> so they encamped<WH2583> by their standards,<WH1714> and so they set out,<WH5265> everyone<WH376> by their families,<WH4940> according to their fathers<WH1>' houses.<WH1004>
